::GoldenEye::

She watched as Tails entered the ship. She sighed and bid a silent 
farewell to her friend and flew off to her nest.  As she flew she 
wondered why the heck she didn't atke full advantage of the small 
squirrel maximal.  "Maybe I'm getting soft in my old age." she said 
to herself.
